['The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining, optimizing, and securing our company’s network infrastructure and on-prem/cloud services-environment, ensuring reliable and efficient IT operations. This role will include managing Active Directory services, enabling secure and efficient user management across the organization. You will collaborate closely with other IT team members to provide technical support, manage network hardware, monitor security protocols, and support hybrid infrastructure.', 'Key Responsibilities:
Network Administration:
Manage and maintain the company’s on-premises network, including routers, switches, firewalls, VPNs, and Wi-Fi systems.
Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement solutions to enhance network reliability and performance.
Develop and enforce network policies and procedures, including network security protocols.

Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure Management:
Administer a hybrid environment combining on-premises and cloud infrastructure to support applications, data storage, and backup needs.
Administer Microsoft SQL DB is a strong plus
Manage Active Directory services across the hybrid environment, including user provisioning, synchronization, group policies, and access management in both on-premises and cloud directories.
Optimize resource allocation across on-premises and cloud environments, ensuring cost-effectiveness and efficient performance.

Security & Compliance:
Monitor and secure network and cloud environments against unauthorized access, vulnerabilities, and cyber threats.
Conduct regular audits, backups, and disaster recovery planning.
Stay updated on cybersecurity best practices and apply these within network, on-prem and cloud infrastructure.

IT Support & Troubleshooting:
Provide technical support to internal teams and resolve hardware, software, and network issues.
Maintain IT infrastructure documentation, including Active Directory structure, and update system inventory.
Coordinate with third-party vendors for maintenance and troubleshooting as necessary.

System Optimization & Continuous Improvement:
Continuously evaluate and optimize network performance, identifying opportunities for efficiency improvements.
Implement automation and monitoring tools to improve system reliability and scalability.
Participate in capacity planning, ensuring the network and cloud infrastructure, including Active Directory, can support future growth.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Experience: 3 to 5 years in network administration or IT infrastructure roles.

Technical Skills:
Proficiency with networking protocols and technologies (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLANs).
Hands-on experience managing firewalls, routers, and switches (e.g., Cisco, Fortinet).
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (preferably Azure or AWS).
Expertise in managing and configuring Active Directory in both on-premises and cloud (Entra ID) environments.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Network Administration:', 'Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure Management:', 'Security & Compliance:', 'IT Support & Troubleshooting:', 'System Optimization & Continuous Improvement:', 'Required Skills & Qualifications:', 'Experience:', 'Technical Skills:', 'Expertise in managing and configuring VMware Server (Esxi 6.0)  on-premises.', 'Knowledge of hybrid cloud and on-premises integration strategies

Security Knowledge: Familiarity with security best practices, VPNs, SDWAN, firewalls, and anti-virus solutions.

Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.

Certifications (preferred): CCNA, CompTIA Network+, Fortinet, Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate, AWS Certified SysOps Administrator, VMware Certified


Diverse and inclusive workplace
️‍️Friendly, Dynamic Working environment
Competitive Salary & Bonus
Insurance Program for all members
‍Fully funded Training & Professional Qualifications', 'Security Knowledge:', 'Problem-Solving:', 'Certifications (preferred):']

['Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'IT Business Analyst', 'IT Business Analyst', 'The role', 'The role', "Our IT Business Analyst is an integral part of a cross-functional, fast-evolving team that bridges the gap between technology and business needs. Your daily life involves engaging with users, developers, and external IT partners to gather, evaluate, and translate business requirements into precise, actionable plans. When a new IT project is initiated, you're the first to dive into understanding the needs behind it—identifying stakeholders, capturing the requirements and ensuring that every technical aspect aligns with the business goals. You guide the process from concept to delivery, making sure that what gets built is not only functional but truly fits the users' needs. Whether you’re drafting project documentation, running a cost-benefit analysis, or supporting user training, your work has a direct impact on project success and team alignment. This is a full-time on-site role as an IT Business Analyst at Alumil located in Thessaloniki.", 'Your impact', 'Your impact', "To thrive in this role, you need a strong analytical mindset and a deep understanding of both technical systems and business operations. But that's just the start. We're looking for a people-focused professional—someone who can simplify complexity, navigate competing priorities, and communicate clearly with everyone from stakeholders to developers. You love the pace, the variety, and the satisfaction of seeing a well-built solution come to life. Your main focus at the moment is in implementing an ERP transition, together with the rest of the team. ['Στα ΕΛΤΑ, επενδύουμε στους ανθρώπους μας — σε εκείνους που στηρίζουν με
τεχνική επάρκεια και συνέπεια την καθημερινή λειτουργία της εταιρίας και χτίζουν
μαζί μας το αύριο.', 'Αναζητούμε δύο νέα στελέχη Πληροφορικής που θα ενισχύσουν τις ομάδες μας στην
υποστήριξη κρίσιμων πληροφοριακών υποδομών και εφαρμογών.', 'Αν έχεις διάθεση να προσφέρεις, να αναλάβεις ρόλο με ουσία και να εξελιχθείς σε
ένα περιβάλλον που αλλάζει με σχέδιο, μπορείς να κάνεις το επόμενο βήμα στην
επαγγελματική σου πορεία — εκεί όπου η συνέπεια και η αξιοπιστία έχουν
πραγματική αξία.

Ρόλος', 'Ρόλος', 'Ως IT Engineer, θα αναλάβεις την τεχνική υποστήριξη υποδομών και δικτύου,
συμβάλλοντας καθοριστικά στην απρόσκοπτη λειτουργία των πληροφοριακών μας
συστημάτων.', 'Κύριες Αρμοδιότητες', 'Κύ', 'ριες Αρμοδιότητες', '• Υποστήριξη εξοπλισμού και εφαρμογών.
• Διάγνωση και επίλυση τεχνικών προβλημάτων.
• Διαχείριση περιβάλλοντος Microsoft 365 και Azure (Entra).
• Ρυθμίσεις δικτύου (VPN, VLANs, firewalls).
• Ticketing, τεκμηρίωση και βελτίωση διαδικασιών.', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα', '• Τουλάχιστον 3 χρόνια εμπειρίας σε IT Support.
• Καλή γνώση Windows OS, Active Directory, DNS, DHCP.
• Εμπειρία σε MSSQL και cloud περιβάλλοντα (Microsoft Azure).
• Κατανόηση βασικών αρχών ασφάλειας και δικτύων.
• Καλή γνώση αγγλικών και ομαδικότητα.', 'Γιατί να εργαστείς μαζί μας', 'Γιατί να εργαστείς μαζί μας', '• Συμμετοχή στον ψηφιακό μετασχηματισμό ενός οργανισμού με
σταθερότητα, αποστολή και μέλλον.
• Πραγματική ευκαιρία ανάπτυξης σε ένα σύγχρονο εργασιακό περιβάλλον.
• Έμφαση στη συνεχή επιμόρφωση και στη διαμόρφωση ουσιαστικού
επαγγελματικού ρόλου', 'Αποστολή βιογραφικών από 8 Μαΐου έως τις 28 Μαΐου 2025 με θέμα τη θέση εργασίας, που σας ενδιαφέρει']

details: ['Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'IT Business Analyst', 'IT Business Analyst', 'The role', 'The role', "Our IT Business Analyst is an integral part of a cross-functional, fast-evolving team that bridges the gap between technology and business needs. Your daily life involves engaging with users, developers, and external IT partners to gather, evaluate, and translate business requirements into precise, actionable plans. When a new IT project is initiated, you're the first to dive into understanding the needs behind it—identifying stakeholders, capturing the requirements and ensuring that every technical aspect aligns with the business goals. You guide the process from concept to delivery, making sure that what gets built is not only functional but truly fits the users' needs. Whether you’re drafting project documentation, running a cost-benefit analysis, or supporting user training, your work has a direct impact on project success and team alignment. This is a full-time on-site role as an IT Business Analyst at Alumil located in Thessaloniki.", 'Your impact', 'Your impact', "To thrive in this role, you need a strong analytical mindset and a deep understanding of both technical systems and business operations. But that's just the start. We're looking for a people-focused professional—someone who can simplify complexity, navigate competing priorities, and communicate clearly with everyone from stakeholders to developers. You love the pace, the variety, and the satisfaction of seeing a well-built solution come to life. Your main focus at the moment is in implementing an ERP transition, together with the rest of the team. Your daily routine is rigorous but ever challenging!", 'Requirements', 'Proven experience for 2-5 years in a similar position is required', 'Bachelor in IT, Business Administration, Economics or any relevant background', 'MSc in MBA, Informatics or Project Management will be a plus', 'Excellent use of English (oral and written)', 'SAP ERP knowledge would be an asset', 'Desired knowledge of ERP, WMS, CRM, BI, B2B programs', 'Ability to travel abroad', 'Good knowledge of Databases (SQL)', 'Knowledge of German will be a plus', 'Organization & communication skills', 'Problem-solving ability and critical thinking', 'Benefits', 'Provision of private life & health insurance', 'Benefits according to performance', 'Continuous learning and support', 'Excellent working environment', 'Annual training plan based on your needs', 'Role specific benefits', 'About us', 'About us', 'At ALUMIL we are building excellence every day.', 'Alumil has more than 30 years of experience in the production of architectural aluminium systems and more than 3.000 employees. We are one of the most advanced companies globally owning state-of-the art production lines in our 12 factories in Europe. Alumil, is a family-owned business that also embraces all of its employees like family. Our culture’s primary focus is on integrity, team spirit, initiative, loyalty, sustainability and “meraki” (spirited work).', 'ALUMIL opposes any discrimination, unequal treatment and violation of human rights and ensures the provision of equal opportunities at work. When hiring and evaluating employees, it does not discriminate based on race, gender, religion, age, disability, sexual orientation, nationality, political beliefs or social status.']

['Aναζητούμε IT Business Analyst για την ομάδα της Διεύθυνσης ΙΤ στις εγκαταστάσεις μας στη ΒΙ.ΠΕ. Σίνδου, στη Θεσσαλονίκη.

Η συγκεκριμένη θέση αναφέρεται στον IT Business Analyst Officer και στόχος είναι η πραγματοποίηση και ο συντονισμός όλων των απαραίτητων ενεργειών για την επιτυχή υλοποίηση ενός έργου πληροφορικής.


Κύρια καθήκοντα

•    Κατανόηση επιχειρησιακών αναγκών που αφορούν τη Διεύθυνση ΙΤ 
•    Οργάνωση και συντονισμός όλων των απαραίτητων ενεργειών με στόχο την ορθή υλοποίηση των έργων πληροφορικής
•    Επικοινωνία με χρήστες, ομάδα υλοποίησης και εξωτερικούς συνεργάτες
•    Ανάλυση επιχειρησιακών αναγκών και εντοπισμός πιθανών λύσεων', 'IT Business Analyst', 'Κύρια καθήκοντα', 'Απαραίτητα προσόντα

•    Πτυχίο Πληροφορικής
•    Εργασιακή εμπειρία 2+ έτη σε σχετική θέση
•    Πολύ καλή γνώση συγκεκριμένων συστημάτων όπως ERP, WMS, CRM
•    Άριστη γνώση της αγγλικής γλώσσας
•    Εξαιρετικές οργανωτικές και επικοινωνιακές δεξιότητες
•    Ικανότητα επίλυσης προβλημάτων
•    Εξοικείωση με τη γλώσσα προγραμματισμού SQL θα θεωρηθεί επιπλέον προσόν', 'Απαραίτητα προσόντα', 'Τι προσφέρουμε

details:
['Are you a skilled mid-level Web Developer with a strong technical foundation looking to take the next step in your career? Would you like to grow your impact by joining a leading Online Travel Agency (OTA) that’s shaping the future of online reservation systems with innovative technologies?', 'Web Developer', 'The Web Developer position is full-time and permanent, based in Nea Makri, East Attica, Greece. The working model can be hybrid.', 'The Web Developer position is full-time and permanent', 'The working model can be hybrid.', 'GOFERRY is a leading online ferry booking system that has been operating worldwide since 2007. Our team currently develops online ferry booking systems for end users and B2B applications.', 'As a Web Developer, you will join our experienced development team and work with the latest technologies in .NET and front-end UI frameworks. You’ll contribute to building and maintaining modern, high-performance booking systems for users worldwide. In this role, you will take ownership of key development tasks on large-scale .NET and Vue projects. You will work closely with your agile team to ensure efficient and high-quality delivery, while also collaborating with colleagues to troubleshoot issues, implement solutions, and enhance the user experience. You will actively participate in coding, reviewing pull requests, and contribute to ongoing improvements, all while focusing on continuous learning and growth within the team.', 'Web Developer', 'Duties', 'Duties', 'As a Web Developer, you will join an autonomous team of software engineers, and your primary duties will be the following:', 'Web Developer', '● Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code
● Develop data processing solutions per specifications
● Support bug fixes and existing feature enhancements
● Utilize, communicate and follow coding standards', 'Tech stack: Most sites and services are written in C# / ASP.NET, and new services are written in .NET Core. New applications use vue.js in the front end, while older ones use jQuery. MS SQL Server is used for most storage needs, but Redis is used when applicable. In addition, the company uses Git for code versioning and CI.', 'Prerequisites', 'Prerequisites', '● Minimum 2 years of experience
● Good knowledge of C# .NET Core, EF Core, jQuery, Vue.js or similar frameworks, MS SQL
● Good knowledge of CSS3, HTML (HTML5), Responsive web design
● English speaking', 'Desired', 'Desired', '● Experience with complex applications, APIs and BackOffice systems
● Basic knowledge of Varnish, Redis, and other supplementary technologies used in the modern development process
● Experience with Git based development workflows and agile software processes
● Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) Methods
● Azure Pipelines', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', '● Join a medium-sized team of highly motivated developers
● Competitive remuneration package
● Semi-flexible working hours
● Possibility of hybrid collaboration (remote work-office presence)']

details: ['Mellon Technologies SA, seeks to hire a Senior Procurement Officer on behalf of a large Financial Institute.', 'Senior Procurement Officer', 'By joining this role, you’ll be part of the IT Strategic Procurement Department which is responsible for managing and processing demand related to IT goods and services as requested by the Bank’s Units and Subsidiaries.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', '·        Management of requests mainly of a strategic nature and conducting tenders for the supply of services and goods in IT projects, to new and existing suppliers, to cover the needs of the Group. For example, the IT Procurement Department deals with projects that contribute to the completion of the Bank Transformation Program plan, Cloud Provider & Services project, projects concerning systemic implementation of HR, IT Outsourcing projects etc.', '·        Conducting negotiations with suppliers, indicatively regarding costs and specifications for new as well as existing (business as usual) projects and requests.', '·        Monitoring spend under his/hers responsibility. Identification of operational improvements for the Bank and management of related actions.', '·        Direct cooperation with the requesting Units to understand and process their requests, as well as with other Support Units regarding the completeness of the requests (budget, etc.).', '·        Adherence to a code of ethics in all communications with suppliers.', '·        Preparation and submission of requests for approval to the Banks’ Group Procurement Committee and their presentation.', 'Requirements', '·        Have 5 years professional experience within an established organization in Procurement or in a related field', '·        Hold a Degree of Higher Educational Institution in Finance, Business, Engineering, or a quantitative field of study', '·        Are Proficient of the MS Office suite. ERP knowledge (i.e. SAP) is also a desirable attribute.', '·        Are fluent in the English language.', '·        Have negotiation skills.', '·        Have developed communication skills with an emphasis on the ability to exercise influence.', '·        Have the ability to communicate well and collaborate with internal customers and suppliers.', '·        Have adaptive thinking and perception.', '·        Have a developed level of initiative with an emphasis on the ability to make quick decisions and the ability to solve problems immediately.', 'Benefits', '·   Competitive Remuneration Package', '·   Career Development and Training', '·   A working environment where you feel valued and appreciated', '·   Mon - Fri Full Time']

details: ['At DTS Cloud Security, an integral part of the DTS Group, we are at the forefront of innovation in cyber security, managed services and technologies. details: ['Η εταιρεία:', 'Η εταιρεία:', 'Ο ΕΠΑΦΟΣ, μέλος του Ομίλου Quest, δραστηριοποιείται από το 1987 στην Πληροφορική ειδικά για τους χώρους της εκπαίδευσης και είναι σήμερα η κορυφαία εταιρεία αυτού του χώρου. Με 75 άτομα επιστημονικό και τεχνικό προσωπικό, με περισσότερους από 10.000 ενεργούς πελάτες στην Ελλάδα και στο Εξωτερικό και με δεκάδες καινοτόμα προϊόντα λογισμικού η εταιρεία έχει σταθερούς ρυθμούς ανάπτυξης και διαρκώς αυξανόμενες ανάγκες προσωπικού.', 'ΕΠΑΦΟΣ', 'Ομίλου Quest', 'Αναζητούμε έμπειρο Σύμβουλο Πωλήσεων με ουσιαστικές γνώσεις και διάθεση να εργαστούν σε ένα ιδιαίτερα απαιτητικό τμήμα του ΕΠΑΦΟΥ.', 'Σύμβουλο Πωλήσεων', 'Ο ρόλος:', 'Ο ρόλος:', 'Ο/η κατάλληλος/η υποψήφιος/α θα ενταχθεί στο Τμήμα Πωλήσεων Εκπαιδευτικών Λύσεων της εταιρείας και θα αναφέρεται απευθείας στον Διευθυντή Πωλήσεων.', 'Τμήμα Πωλήσεων Εκπαιδευτικών Λύσεων', 'Ο/Η υποψήφιος/α θα είναι υπεύθυνος/η για την προώθηση των προϊόντων Πληροφορικής της εταιρείας και την ανάπτυξη νέων αγορών σε υφιστάμενους ή δυνητικούς τελικούς πελάτες πάσης φύσεως. Η θέση απαιτεί συχνές επισκέψεις / παρουσιάσεις στους χώρους των πελατών, αρχικά στην Αττική και μελλοντικά σε όλη την Ελλάδα ή/και Κύπρο.', 'απαιτεί συχνές επισκέψεις / παρουσιάσεις στους χώρους των πελατών,', 'Κύριες αρμοδιότητες:', 'Κύριες αρμοδιότητες:', 'Παρουσίαση των προϊόντων και λύσεων της ΕΠΑΦΟΥ σε υφιστάμενους και νέους πελάτες', 'Συμμετοχή σε εκθέσεις με ομιλίες, επιδείξεις κλπ', 'Ανάλυση αναγκών πελατών και η σύνταξη των αντίστοιχων προσφορών', 'Ενίσχυση της σχέσης με τους πελάτες και διατήρηση μακροχρόνιων συνεργασιών', 'Απαραίτητα προσόντα:', 'Απαραίτητα προσόντα:', 'Tουλάχιστον 3 χρόνια εμπειρίας σε τμήμα πωλήσεων Πληροφορικής', 'Tουλάχιστον 3 χρόνια εμπειρίας σε τμήμα πωλήσεων Πληροφορικής', 'Ιδιαίτερα επιθυμητή είναι η εμπειρία σε πωλήσεις λογισμικού (ERP κλπ.)', 'Άριστες γνώσεις πληροφορικής και των τρεχόντων τάσεων και εξελίξεων', 'Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ/ΤΕΙ σε Πληροφορική ή συναφείς κλάδους', 'Μεταπτυχιακές σπουδές, ιδιαίτερα σε Πανεπιστήμια του εξωτερικού θα θεωρηθούν επιπλέον προσόν', 'Άριστη γνώση της Αγγλικής γλώσσας, ιδιαίτερα στον προφορικό λόγο', 'Ικανότητα να εργάζεστε υπό συνθήκες πίεσης και να επιτυγχάνετε στόχους', 'Εξαιρετικές επικοινωνιακές ικανότητες και διάθεση για τακτικές επισκέψεις σε πελάτες', 'Ικανότητα οργάνωσης, διαχείρισης χρόνου και στοχοθεσίας', 'Προσφέρουμε:', 'Προσφέρουμε:', 'Φιλικό και ευχάριστο περιβάλλον εργασίας', 'Ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών αναλόγως προσόντων', 'Συνεχή επιμόρφωση και εκπαίδευση', 'Μεγάλες προοπτικές εξέλιξης στον μεγαλύτερο όμιλο Τεχνολογίας της χώρας', 'Ενημερωθείτε για την Πολιτική Απορρήτου: https://www.epafos.gr/politiki aporitou', 'https://www.epafos.gr/politiki aporitou']

details: ['H Intercool Hellas, είναι μια δυναμικά αναπτυσσόμενη εταιρεία στον χώρο της επαγγελματικής ψύξης και κλιματισμού.  Στην Intercool , είμαστε μια νέα ομάδα που έχουμε εξελιχθεί σε σημαντικό προμηθευτή κλιματιστικών συστημάτων, επαγγελματικών ψυγείων και αντλιών θερμότητας.  Προσφέρουμε ολοκληρωμένες λύσεις, από την προμήθεια εξοπλισμού έως την εξειδικευμένη τεχνική υποστήριξη μετά την πώληση.', 'Συνεργαζόμαστε στενά με την Sendo Global για την αντιπροσώπευση των προϊόντων κλιματισμού και είμαστε στρατηγικός εταίρος της Sandenintercool Thailand Plc, στον τομέα της επαγγελματικής ψύξης .', 'Στην Intercool Hellas συνεχίζουμε να επενδύουμε στην καινοτομία και την ποιότητα, προσφέροντας λύσεις που συνδυάζουν υψηλή απόδοση, χαμηλή κατανάλωση ενέργειας και μοντέρνο σχεδιασμό, όπως φαίνεται από τις πρόσφατες συνεργασίες μας με σημαντικές εταιρείες του κλάδου.', 'Διαθέτουμε ένα εργασιακό περιβάλλον όπου ο κάθε εργαζόμενος έχει πάθος με τα αποτελέσματα, διάθεση να επιλύει προβλήματα, να δίνει λύσεις στους πελάτες και να προσαρμόζεται εύκολα βλέποντας ευκαιρίες εκεί που άλλοι βλέπουν εμπόδια.', 'Έχουμε δημιουργήσει τη θέση ΥΠΑΛΛΗΛΟΣ ΥΠΟΣΤΗΡΙΞΗΣ ΕΦΑΡΜΟΓΩΝ – ΜΗΧΑΝΟΓΡΑΦΟΣ για εσένα που :', 'ΥΠΑΛΛΗΛΟΣ ΥΠΟΣΤΗΡΙΞΗΣ ΕΦΑΡΜΟΓΩΝ – ΜΗΧΑΝΟΓΡΑΦΟΣ', 'Θα διαχειρίζεσαι τις πληροφοριακές υποδομές της εταιρείας στην Πάτρα . Θα είσαι υπεύθυνος για την ομαλή λειτουργία των πληροφοριακών συστημάτων της εταιρίας καθώς και την ανάπτυξη και υποστήριξη των ήδη υπαρχουσών customized εφαρμογών.', 'Τι θα Κάνεις:', 'Τι θα Κάνεις:', 'Θα έχεις αρμοδιότητες σε Hardware, Software και Δίκτυα, Βάσεις Δεδομένων όπως:', 'Λειτουργικά Συστήματα', 'Λειτουργικά Συστήματα', 'All Microsoft Windows (XP - Server 2019), Virtualization : VMWare', 'ASP, VBSCRIPT, .NET, PHP, JAVASCRIPT, HTML , DHTML, XHTML, CSSSQL : SQL, PL/SQL, T-SQL', 'Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL', 'Εφαρμογές', 'Εφαρμογές', 'Microsoft Office (All versions), Microsoft Visual Studio, Adobe Creative Suite', 'Το έχεις;', 'Το έχεις;', 'Πτυχίο ΑΕΙ ή ΤΕΙ', 'Άριστη γνώση Αγγλικών', 'Ομαδικό πνεύμα και εναρμόνιση με τις εταιρικές διαδικασίες', 'Τι έχουμε για σένα :', 'Τι έχουμε για σένα :', 'Βonus στόχων', 'Ευκαιρίες ανάδειξης στον οργανισμό', 'Συνεχή εκπαίδευση σε τεχνολογίες & mentoring', 'Smart εργασιακή κουλτούρα: Πέρα από τα ρολόγια, μας νοιάζει το αποτέλεσμα', 'Είσαι μέσα;', 'Είσαι μέσα;', 'Είμαστε εδώ για να σε ακούσουμε! Βρες μας στο www.intercool.com.gr, ενημερώσου για τα Inter-cool προϊόντα μας και γίνε ένας από Eμάς. #IntercoolPeople #IntercoolCareers']

details:
['Η TECHNORAN A.E., (www.technoran.gr), με σταθερή τριακονταπενταετή ανοδική πορεία στο χώρο  της  πληροφορικής & των ταμειακών συστημάτων, ενισχύοντας την φιλοσοφία για επένδυση σε ανθρώπινο δυναμικό και νέα προϊόντα, ζητά ενθουσιώδες δραστήριο άτομο ως σύμβουλο πωλήσεων των αντιπροσώπων της.', 'Κύρια καθήκοντα και ευθύνες:
•    Ανάπτυξη πελατολογίου και τεχνική υποστήριξη του 
•    Παρακολούθηση και ενημέρωση για τις ενέργειες του ανταγωνισμού
•    Διαχείριση των παραγγελιών
•    Προσήλωση στην επίτευξη αποτελεσμάτων 
•    Ανάπτυξη και εφαρμογή στρατηγικού μάρκετινγκ, συμμετοχή σε εκθέσεις και σε σεμινάρια εκπαίδευσης πωλήσεων', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα
•    Εξαιρετικές διαπραγματευτικές ικανότητες με στόχο την φροντίδα των συνεργατών
•    Επικοινωνιακές ικανότητες με έμφαση στις διαπροσωπικές σχέσεις προσανατολισμένες στους συνεργάτες και στο αποτέλεσμα
•    Γνώση Αγγλικής γλώσσας
•    Επαρκή γνώση ERP και CRM
•    Επάρκεια στα ψηφιακά μέσα και στα μέσα κοινωνικής δικτύωσης
•    Καλή γνώση Windows, Android, Software και δικτύων
•    Κατοχή διπλώματος ΙΧ Β’ κατηγορίας
•    Δυνατότητα ταξιδίων
•    Εκπληρωμένες στρατιωτικές υποχρεώσεις', 'Επιθυμητά Προσόντα
•    Επαφή με retail συστήματα (pos, Fiscal Solutions, mini printers)', 'Παροχές
•    Ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών αναλόγως προσόντων
•    Σταθερή απασχόληση
•    Προοπτικές και ευκαιρίες εξέλιξης
•    Συνεχής εκπαίδευση σε νέα προϊόντα
•    Μισθό και μπόνους', 'Αποστολή βιογραφικών στο apappa@technoran.gr']

details: ['As a mid-level ESM / ITSM Consultant, you will be an integral part of our Service Management Delivery team. You will be responsible for translating business requirements to technical specifics and developing software architecture and design based on client or company requirements. You will work with management to define software requirements and take the lead on operational and technical projects. The role requires the ability to work independently with little supervision. The goal is to build /configure high-quality software solutions using low-code platforms  that are aligned with user needs and business goals.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Leads in configuring, maintaining, enhancing, and supporting commercial software packages.', 'Leads in customizing and adding new features to commercial software according to end-user requests.', 'Leads the maintenance of day-to-day operations of various applications.', "Leads in designing and building new applications based on customer's requirements and specifications.", 'Writes and performs tests for applications, fixes problems as they arise, and assists with product launches.', 'Provides technical support and troubleshoots problems related to applications.', 'Writes technical documentation and uses best development practices regarding version control and testing.', 'Performs software upgrades and keeps track of software licensing.', 'Direct involvement with vendors, managing relationships, including scoping of application services and review of deliverables.', 'Assists with presales activities and demonstrations.', 'Qualifications:', '3+ years of work experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer.', 'BSc degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.', 'Experience with test-driven low code development, RDBMS, and ITIL v3 / ITIL v4.', 'Proficiency in software engineering tools.', 'Ability to document requirements and specifications.', 'Experience in reporting tools like Grafana will be appreciated.', 'Experience in system administration is a plus.', 'Experience working with Operations Management tools and Service Management tools will be appreciated.', 'Enthusiastic to take new initiatives.', 'Ability to guide lower-level engineers.', 'Proficient in English.', 'Benefits:', 'As an equal-opportunity employer, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Our company is people - -centric and offers personalized benefits to each employee:', 'We want you to be well compensated for what you bring in, so we offer an attractive salary package', 'Your health matters to us, so all colleagues have a private health insurance plan from day one', 'We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting projects', 'We never stop learning and evolving! You will have your own mentor and training program to help you develop in a company with unlimited possibilities, and you will join our training sessions and online courses that we provide', 'We love the Relational vibes, so we gather on smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together!', "Relational Financial Solutions adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy, which is published at https://www.relationalfs.com/legal-information/pri.... By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with Relational Financial Solutions, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorize Relational Financial Solutions to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line with the Policy."]

role: Σύμβουλος Εφαρμογών Πληροφορικής ERP, WMS, CRM
details:
['Εμπορική εταιρεία εισαγωγική, χονδρικής, λιανικής αναζητά Σύμβουλο εφαρμογών πληροφορικής ERP, WMS, CRM για να ενταχθεί στο τμήμα μηχανογράφησης για εργασία πλήρους απασχόλησης. 
Αρμοδιότητες: Μελέτη και ανάλυση πληροφοριακού περιβάλλοντος της εταιρίας. Προτάσεις και σχεδιασμός βέλτιστων πρακτικών για την αντιμετώπιση προβλημάτων και βελτίωση όλων των διαδικασιών της εταιρείας.
Επίβλεψη της υλοποίησης σε project που ήδη τρέχουν και σε μελλοντικά, σε συνεργασία με τη διοίκηση της εταιρείας και τους εξωτερικούς συνεργάτες που τα έχουν αναλάβει.
Απαραίτητα προσόντα: Γνώση και εμπειρία εμπορικών και λογιστικών εφαρμογών σε επίπεδο παραμετροποίησης. Θα εκτιμηθούν ιδιαίτερα οι γνώσεις σε SAP Β1. 
Γνώση και εμπειρία επιχειρηματικών διαδικασιών εμπορικής και οικονομικής διαχείρισης και εφοδιαστικής αλυσίδας.
Η εταιρία προσφέρει ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών, προοπτικές εξέλιξης και ανάπτυξης σε ένα άριστο περιβάλλον εργασιακό και ανθρώπινων σχέσεων.']
tags: ['πληροφορική', 'εφαρμογες πληροφορικης', 'it manager']

details: ['Τεχνικός πεδίου', 'Τεχνικός πεδίου', 'Ο Όμιλος εταιρειών OLYMPIOS, έχοντας υλοποιήσει με απόλυτη επιτυχία πάνω από 120 έργα διαχείρισης κι εκσυγχρονισμού δικτυών υδατικών πόρων, και με ισχυρές συνεργασίες σε Ελλάδα κι εξωτερικό, συνεχίζει να επεκτείνεται σε ολόκληρο το φάσμα των έξυπνων πόλεων.', 'Ο Όμιλος εταιρειών OLYMPIOS, ιδρύθηκε το 1997 και πρωτοστατεί στον σχεδιασμό, την ανάπτυξη και την εφαρμογή σύνθετων και βιώσιμων τεχνολογικών λύσεων στους τομείς της ενέργειας της ύδρευσης, της αποχέτευσης, της άρδευσης, του περιβάλλοντος και των έξυπνων πόλεων. Αναπτύσσουμε και υιοθετούμε έξυπνες και καινοτόμες τεχνολογίες αιχμής συγχρονίζοντας τους τομείς του Information Technology και του Operational Technology, για να καθοδηγήσουμε τους πελάτες μας στην νέα ψηφιακή πραγματικότητα στους τομείς εξειδίκευσής μας. Μελετούμε, σχεδιάζουμε, υλοποιούμε, λειτουργούμε και συντηρούμε δημόσια και ιδιωτικά έργα , παρέχοντάς τεχνολογικό εξοπλισμό και προϊόντα λογισμικού, καθώς και ολοκληρωμένες λύσεις και υπηρεσίες . Η αξιοπιστία του Ομίλου Εταιρειών Olympios βασίζεται στην πολυετή εμπειρία μας, στην διαρκή μελέτη και κατανόηση των τεχνολογικών εξελίξεων καθώς και στην άριστη κατάρτιση των επαγγελματιών που στελεχώνουν τις εταιρείες του.', 'Στο πλαίσιο ανάπτυξης της Τεχνικής Διεύθυνσης, αναζητούμε Τεχνικό πεδίου με σκοπό την διασφάλιση αποτελεσματικής εκτέλεσης των έργων σύμφωνα με τα ποιοτικά standards της εταιρίας.', 'Τεχνικό πεδίου', 'Αρμοδιότητες:', 'Αρμοδιότητες:', 'Εκτέλεση επιτόπιων μετρήσεων πεδίου', 'Επίβλεψη εγκατάστασης εξοπλισμού', 'Προφίλ Υποψηφίου', 'Προφίλ Υποψηφίου', 'Τεχνικός Δικτύων & Τηλεπικοινωνιών ή Υπολογιστών', 'Άδεια οδήγησης', 'Δυνατότητα ταξιδιών για μικρά χρονικά διαστήματα']

role: SAP Business Solutions Manager, TEMES SA
details: ['TEMES Group is a leading investor, developer and operator of high-end tourism and real estate destinations in Greece.', 'The Group owns Costa Navarino, one of the largest tourism investments in the Mediterranean. The destination encompasses five distinct resort areas developed on 1,000 hectares, featuring 5-star hotels, luxury private residences, signature golf courses, and many year-round facilities and activities.', 'The Group also controls Ionian Hotel Enterprises S.A., owner of a historic and flagship property in the center of Athens, former Hilton Athens, which is currently being transformed into a new city destination.', 'Additionally, TEMES has partnered with Lamda Development S.A. with the majority stake in the joint development of two state-of-the-art hotels along with branded residences in the framework of the landmark project of The Ellinikon, which aims to put the ‘Athens Riviera’ on the global tourism map.', 'We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced SAP Business Solutions Manager to join our IT team. This role will be responsible for overseeing the implementation, maintenance, and optimization of SAP systems, specifically focusing on the MM (Materials Management), FI (Financial Accounting), and SD (Sales and Distribution) modules. The SAP Business Solutions Manager will ensure that these systems effectively support business operations and drive efficiency across the organization, managing both vendor relationships and an in-house team. The position will be reporting to the IT Director.', 'SAP Business Solutions Manager', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap implementation:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap implementation', 'Understand and address business needs and challenges related to SAP solutions, including MM, FI, and SD modules.', 'Key contributor in developing and driving the SAP strategy and roadmap, ensuring alignment with business objectives.', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to select and deliver effective SAP solutions, working closely with vendor partners and internal teams.', 'Build and lead a skilled team dedicated to SAP solutions development, including identifying key roles, recruiting top talent, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.', 'Project Management:', 'Project Management', 'Coordinate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide solutions.', 'Oversee the implementation and optimization of SAP MM, FI, and SD modules to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.', 'Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources effectively to ensure successful delivery.', 'Vendor and Team Management:', 'Vendor and Team Management:', 'Manage relationships with SAP vendors to ensure effective delivery of services and solutions.', 'Lead and mentor an in-house team, providing direction and support to ensure high performance and professional growth.', 'Facilitate effective communication between vendors, IT, and business units to ensure mutual understanding and cooperation.', 'Collaboration and Communication:', 'Collaboration and Communication', 'Ensure effective communication between IT and business units.', 'Conduct regular meetings to discuss progress, challenges, and opportunities for improvement.', 'Change Management:', 'Change Management', 'Lead efforts to ensure smooth adoption of SAP technologies and address any resistance to change.', 'Develop and implement change management strategies to support SAP initiatives.', 'Performance Metrics:', 'Performance Metrics', 'Define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of SAP initiatives.', 'Conduct regular performance reviews to ensure goals are met and identify areas for improvement.', 'Requirements', '5-8 years of experience in IT, with significant experience in SAP implementation and management, particularly with MM, FI, and SD modules.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field', 'SAP certification is highly desirable', 'Master’s degree is a plus.', 'Strong configuration and hands-on experience with SAP MM, FI, and SD modules. Knowledge of integration with other SAP modules and external applications.', 'Strong knowledge of business processes analysis and challenges', 'Passionate about delivering solutions and solving customer and business problems', 'Experience with Product Lifecycle Management, project management tools and methodologies (e.g. Agile, Scrum)', 'Strong decision-making skills and ability to prioritize initiatives.', 'Exceptional interpersonal skills for working cross functionally across organizational levels with the ability to collaborate across a diverse, multi-functional environment', 'Strong team management skills, provide direction and mentorship to his/her team (junior to mid-level experience)', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary and benefits package.', 'Opportunities for professional development and continuous learning.', 'Collaborative and innovative work environment.']
tags: ['business solutions', 'sap', 'it']

details: ['ROLE SUMMARY', 'The External Supply/Supplier Collaboration (ESSC) Solutions Manager reports to the Digital Solutions Team Lead and will be responsible for the following functions:', 'Technical/Digital supporting the solution for procurement of direct materials, including the Supplier Chain Collaboration (SCC) Solution.', "Learn and gain expertise in Pfizer's global model template focusing on SAP solution governing procurement of Raw and Packaging materials for the manufacturing plant, as well as procurement of API, bulk and finished goods from contract manufacturers (CMO).", "Learn Pfizer's Business Processes relevant to ES&SC solution areas.", 'Support implementation strategy & timelines for next generation Supplier Collaboration solution (SCC).', 'Engage business user groups to ensure efficient use of the software set.', 'Participate in and lead Pfizer Direct Procurement/External Supply change projects.', 'ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES', 'The ideal candidate must bring technical capabilities, an understanding of Agile methodologies, a strong desire to learn & implement new digital technologies and solutions, as well as a keen interest in direct procurement business processes. Key activities include:', 'Deliver world class External Supply & Supplier Collaboration solutions to Pfizer.', 'Develop technical specification and estimations for assigned projects.', 'Conduct business requirements gathering meetings and workshops in an efficient and productive manner and documents minutes, notes and requirements concisely.', 'Collaborate and partner closely with global Digital teams and business teams to deliver solutions on time and within budget.', 'Develop cost estimates for projects, spend forecast and maintain project financial details in Pfizer internal tools and project portfolio systems.', 'Manage the design, configuration, development, testing and implementation of projects.', 'Coordinate activities with cross-functional teams located in diverse geographical locations, including the engagement of key business stakeholders to contribute to the business process and system development life cycle.', 'Develop strong relationships at all levels and with different cultural backgrounds.', 'Provide technical and functional guidance to key stakeholder', 'Communicate effectively to manage business expectations.', 'Ensure compliance to GMP, deployment standards and quality guidelines with regulatory related obligations are executed with the highest standards of compliance.', 'Leverage agile methodologies for solution planning and project execution.', 'Assist production support team to fix problems in a timely manner.', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', "Bachelor's degree in computer science or related IT discipline.", 'Experience working on SAP Material Management Module, knowledge IDOCS and integration points with MRP in PP, APO and Distribution.', 'Effective communication skills with the ability to build relationships and influence outcomes.', '5+ years of relevant experience in a technology position(s).', 'Experienced working for a large corporate organization.', 'Excellent documentation and organizational skills.', 'Knowledge of the software development lifecycles using agile principles.', 'Quick learner. Demonstrate initiative and ownership.', 'Ability to operate in a global multi-cultural environment of time zones and requirements.', 'Business process acumen understanding of GMP requirements.', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Advanced degree.', 'Experience in SAP DP, SCC.', 'Experienced working with global applications.', 'Work Location Assignment: Hybrid', 'Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.', 'To apply please visit our website www.pfizercareers.com and search job Manager/ Program Manager - (ESSC) Solutions id 4935463.']

details: ['Η Themelio Software, με 35 χρόνια εμπειρίας στην ανάπτυξη λογισμικού για τον κλάδο των κουφωμάτων, αναζητά Σύμβουλο Τηλεφωνικών Πωλήσεων για την προώθηση του Profil UP Flex – ενός πρωτοποριακού εργαλείου για τους επαγγελματίες του κλάδου.', 'Themelio Software', 'Σύμβουλο Τηλεφωνικών Πωλήσεων', 'Αν έχεις εμπειρία σε τηλεφωνικές πωλήσεις ή νιώθεις άνετα να μιλήσεις με πελάτες, διάβασε τι προσφέρουμε και έλα να συζητήσουμε!', 'Αρμοδιότητες', 'Αρμοδιότητες', 'Τηλεφωνική επικοινωνία με εν δυνάμει πελάτες για την παρουσίαση του προϊόντος.', 'Κατανόηση των αναγκών του πελάτη και προσαρμογή της προσέγγισης.', 'Διατήρηση και ανάπτυξη σχέσεων εμπιστοσύνης με το υπάρχον πελατολόγιο.', 'Συνεργασία με την ομάδα marketing για την υλοποίηση ενεργειών προώθησης.', 'Παρακολούθηση στόχων και τακτική αναφορά προόδου.', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα', 'Εμπειρία 2+ ετών σε πωλήσεις (ιδανικά τηλεφωνικές).', 'Πολύ καλή γνώση Η/Υ (Windows, Office, Internet).', 'Πολύ καλή γνώση αγγλικών και εμπειρία σε CRM (επιθυμητό).', 'Ικανότητα επικοινωνίας και προσέγγισης πελατών με επαγγελματισμό και θετική διάθεση.', 'Τι προσφέρουμε', 'Τι προσφέρουμε', 'Σταθερός μισθός + bonus επίτευξης στόχων.', 'Πλήρης ασφαλιστική κάλυψη.', 'Σταθερό πρωινό ωράριο.', 'Ολοκληρωμένη εκπαίδευση προϊόντος και υποστήριξη από την ομάδα.', 'Φιλικό και συνεργατικό περιβάλλον με πραγματικές ευκαιρίες εξέλιξης.', 'Ενδιαφέρεσαι; Στείλε μας το βιογραφικό σου σήμερα και γίνε μέλος της ομάδας μας!']

role: Customer Service Agent / Car Rental Software
details: ["We're looking for an experienced Customer Service Agent to be based at our offices in Iraklion, Athens, Greece.", 'Customer Service Agent', "If you're passionate about delivering exceptional support, thrive in fast-paced environments, and have a background in the car rental industry, we want to hear from you.", 'About the Role', 'About the Role', 'This is a full-time, Monday–Friday, in-office position where you’ll play a critical role in supporting our international client base and ensuring a seamless experience with the Wheels Car Rental System.', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Responding to customer inquiries via phone and ticketing system', 'Delivering training and onboarding sessions to new users', 'Testing and validating new features and product updates', 'Collaborating closely with customers to help them maximize value from our platform', 'What We’re Looking For', 'What We’re Looking For', '2+ years of experience in the car rental industry', 'Experience using Wheels Car Rental System is a major plus', 'Wheels Car Rental System', 'Previous exposure to the travel industry is a bonus', 'Excellent communication skills in English (written & verbal)', 'Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities', 'A customer-first attitude and collaborative mindset', 'What We Offer', 'What We Offer', 'A highly competitive salary package', 'Achievement bonus for all team members', 'A performance-driven, positive, and quiet work environment', 'Be part of a market-leading company shaping the future of mobility software', 'Ready to take the wheel in your career?', 'Ready to take the wheel in your career?', 'Apply now and become part of a fantastic, forward-thinking team at the forefront of the car rental tech industry.']

['You will have a significant technical contribution to large-scale implementation projects', 'You will be given the opportunity to work and take responsibility in challenging engagements in Greece and abroad', 'Your ability to learn and apply advanced Technology solutions, will give you the opportunity to grow professionally and participate in the design and deployment of leading-edge technologies.', "A Bachelor's degree in one of the fields of Computer Science, Software Engineering, or other related discipline", 'Ability to work as a team member', 'Self-motivated to contribute with your own ideas - showcase the feasibility and benefits with a proof of concept and document your cutting edge solution', 'Experience in Java or other object-oriented programming language', 'Completed military obligations (where applicable)', 'Experience in SQL and PL/SQL', 'Working experience with at least one RDBMS e.g. Oracle (preferably), SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.', 'Familiarity with IDE tools e.g. JDeveloper (preferably), Visual Studio etc.', 'Knowledge and/or experience with web services (SOAP, JSON/REST)', 'Knowledge and/or experience with Oracle ADF', 'Knowledge and/or experience with Angular, Ionic or Node.js', 'Knowledge and/or experience with source control software (e.g. GIT, SVN, TFS)', 'Ability to design and develop solutions with business users (feel free to include relevant project and profile links, like GitHub, Kaggle or Stack Overflow)', 'Work experience either in Insurance sector, or in a solution provider environment engaged with Insurance projects implementation', "Competitive remuneration package: You'll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Depending on your experience, our comprehensive rewards package includes benefits that suit your needs including cutting-edge technological equipment, ticket restaurant vouchers, a private health insurance scheme, life insurance, income protection and an exclusive EY benefits club that provides a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions.", "Flexible working arrangements: We operate under a hybrid working model, which is defined based on both your own preferences and team's needs, and we enjoy our summers with short Fridays.", 'Personalized learning experience and career development: We provide free and unlimited access to educational platforms and EY Badges, support certifications, and provide coaching and feedback, as a part of our Leadership & Development process, all of which can lead to a meaningful impact and success as defined by you.', "Transformative leadership: We'll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.", "Diverse and inclusive culture: You'll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.", 'International Experience: Become part of international projects and work along multicultural teams, through our global network.', 'Above all, you will be working in one of the most recognized employers in Greece, as we have been awarded the Top Employers, Great Place to Work and Best Workplaces for Women awards for 2024.']

company: Kariera Group Recruitment Services| Executive Level (C-Level & Senior Talent Acquisition)
details: ['Kariera.Group is looking for a skilled and motivated DevOps Software Engineer to join our engineering team!', 'Kariera.Group', 'DevOps Software Engineer', 'As a leading key player for recruiting in the global job market, we empower employment through every product, service or initiative we produce and support, across Europe and Asia.', 'We have one clear mission: to match the perfect candidate with the right job!', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Design, implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate the software delivery process.', 'Collaborate with software development and IT operations teams to improve deployment processes.', 'Maintain and optimise cloud infrastructure resources for performance and cost-effectiveness.', 'Ensure robust system monitoring and troubleshooting to minimise downtime and enhance application performance.', 'Participate in the software release management and version control processes', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Solid experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.', 'Strong background in programming and scripting languages like Python, Java, or Bash.', 'Proficient with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.', 'Experience with container orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.', 'Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work within a collaborative team environment.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary package with performance-based bonuses.', 'Flexible working hours with the option for remote work.', 'Comprehensive health insurance and wellness initiatives.', 'Opportunities for career advancement in a forward-thinking organisation.', 'Join Kariera.Group  and take your career to new heights!', 'Apply now to become a key player in our software development transformation journey!']

role: Software Developer – Ανάπτυξη και Υποστήριξη Συστήματος Εισροών-Εκροών
details: ['Ο Όμιλος Σπυρίδη αναζητά έναν Software Developer με εξειδίκευση στην ανάπτυξη και συντήρηση πληροφοριακών συστημάτων, για να ενταχθεί στην ομάδα ανάπτυξης και να συμβάλει ουσιαστικά στη διαχείριση και εξέλιξη του Συστήματος Εισροών-Εκροών Καυσίμων.', 'Software Developer', 'Συστήματος Εισροών-Εκροών Καυσίμων', 'Η θέση αφορά τον σχεδιασμό, την προσαρμογή και τη διαρκή αναβάθμιση του λογισμικού με βάση τις επιχειρησιακές ανάγκες αλλά και τις νομοθετικές απαιτήσεις του κλάδου. Παράλληλα, ο υποψήφιος θα συμμετέχει σε δευτερογενές επίπεδο υποστήριξης (second-level support), λειτουργώντας υποστηρικτικά προς την ομάδα του τεχνικού τμήματος, σε περιπτώσεις που απαιτείται τεχνική διερεύνηση.', 'δευτερογενές επίπεδο υποστήριξης (second-level support)', 'Αρμοδιότητες', 'Αρμοδιότητες', 'Ανάπτυξη και συντήρηση εφαρμογών σε VB.NET ή C#, σύμφωνα με τις ανάγκες του συστήματος.', 'VB.NET ή C#', 'Συντήρηση legacy εφαρμογών σε Visual Basic 6 (VB6).', 'Visual Basic 6 (VB6).', 'Παρακολούθηση των νομοθετικών αλλαγών στον τομέα καυσίμων και συστημάτων εισροών-εκροών, και υλοποίηση των απαραίτητων αλλαγών στο λογισμικό.', 'νομοθετικών αλλαγών', 'Ανάπτυξη και βελτιστοποίηση της βάσης δεδομένων, με στόχο την κάλυψη επιχειρησιακών και ρυθμιστικών απαιτήσεων.', 'Συνεργασία με το Τμήμα Τεχνικής Υποστήριξης για επίλυση σύνθετων τεχνικών θεμάτων (second-level support).', 'Τεχνική τεκμηρίωση των αλλαγών και της λειτουργικότητας του λογισμικού.', 'Απαιτούμενα Προσόντα', 'Απαιτούμενα', 'Προσόντα', 'Πολύ καλή γνώση προγραμματισμού σε VB.NET ή C#.', 'VB.NET ή C#', 'Επιθυμητή εμπειρία ή γνώση στη Visual Basic 6 (VB6)', 'Visual Basic 6 (VB6)', 'Καλή γνώση σχεσιακών βάσεων δεδομένων (SQL Server ή αντίστοιχο).', 'Εμπειρία στη χρήση εργαλείων ανάπτυξης όπως Visual Studio 2019+ και Visual Studio 6.', 'Visual Studio 2019+', 'Visual Studio 6', 'Ικανότητα μελέτης και ερμηνείας τεχνικής και νομικής τεκμηρίωσης.', 'Προσανατολισμός στη λεπτομέρεια και στις τεχνικά άρτιες λύσεις.', 'Διάθεση για μάθηση και συνεχή εξέλιξη.', 'Παροχές', 'Παροχές', 'Ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών και παροχών.', 'Δυναμικό και σύγχρονο περιβάλλον εργασίας.', 'Συνεχής εκπαίδευση και ανάπτυξη.', 'Ευκαιρίες επαγγελματικής εξέλιξης.']
tags: ['vb.net, sql, java, xml, csharp, html 5', 'c#', 'second-level support', 'software developer', 'senior software developer', 'visual basic 6', 'τμήμα τεχνικής υποστήριξης', '• c#, visual studio devexpress ή/και syncfusion • asp. net core framework (web api) • asp. netcore mvc • entity framework ή/και o/r mapping και code patterns • sql server', 'visual studio', 'visual studio 2019+', 'visual studio 6', 'βαση δεδομενων', 'τεχνικες λυσεις', 'c#, .net framework, html, css, javascript, jquery, sql server, ui/ux', 'sql server', 'software development software developer software engineer programming languages programmer', 'πληρη απασχοληση']

details: ['Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Develop and maintain back-end services using .NET Core 8+, C#, and VB.NET.', 'Build interactive, responsive front-end UIs using Blazor, Bootstrap.', 'Design and interact with relational databases, particularly SQL Server.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.', 'Write unit tests to ensure reliability and maintainability of code', 'Participate in code reviews and help improve team standards and development practices', 'Technical Skills Required:', 'Technical Skills Required:', 'Proficient in .NET Core, C#, and VB.NET.', 'Experience building RESTful Web APIs.', 'Solid understanding of Blazor for front-end development.', 'Familiarity with Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS.', 'Strong knowledge of SQL Server and database design principles.', 'Qualifications:', 'Qualifications:', '2–5 years of experience in a similar role.', 'BSc and MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.', 'Proven experience developing full-stack web applications.', 'Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.', 'Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team.', 'Nice to Have:', 'Nice to Have:', 'Experience with DevOps pipelines and CI/CD tools.', 'Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure or AWS).', 'Exposure to AI or machine learning techniques, such as working with ML libraries (e.g., ML.NET, TensorFlow, or Python-based tools), or integrating intelligent features into applications.', 'A public GitHub portfolio or other demonstrable code samples that show contributions, coding style, and project experience.', 'Why Join Us?', 'Why Join Us?', "We are a fintech company with a strong passion for delivering tailored solutions that streamline our customers' day-to-day operations. Our team embraces agile methodologies, encouraging continuous improvement, collaboration, and rapid iteration to meet evolving business needs. You'll be part of a dynamic environment where innovation is encouraged, and your contributions have a real impact.", 'We offer a hybrid work model, combining the flexibility of remote work with the benefits of in-person collaboration, and provide a competitive remuneration package that reflects your skills and experience.']
tags: ['.net', 'microsoft .net desktop developer', 'blazor', 'c#', 'software developer', 'software engineer']

['Αt Relational FS we know that companies with a strong positive culture perform so much better. That is why every day we strive to create a collaborative and inclusive working environment where our people can feel empowered to succeed.', 'Relational FS has an opportunity available, to work on complex and challenging new products, to drive transformative change for our top-tier Financial Services clients. Be part of both Product and Discipline teams through our Product-Chapter Matrix and develop state-of-the-art software products in the former, and an ever-evolving engineering culture in the latter.', 'Responsibilities', 'Work closely with a business analysts’ team and stakeholders to design and implement the best solutions.', 'Follow industry’s best practices and standards.', 'Test and deliver high-quality software.', 'Essential Qualifications', 'Excellent English communication (both verbal and written).', 'Familiarity with Agile methodologies.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or other relevant field.', 'Experience in building SPAs with Angular.', 'Experience in Typescript.', 'Experience in building rich responsive/adaptive web UIs with HTML5 and CSS3.', 'Extensive experience in consuming REST APIs and in REST principles.', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience with state management tools (e.g. NGRX, NGXS, Akita, Redux).', 'Familiarity with version control software tools (preferably Git).', 'Familiarity with CSS preprocessors (e.g. Sass, LESS).', 'Familiarity with CSS frameworks (e.g. primeng, tailwind).', 'What Does our tech stack look like?', 'At Relational FS, we pride ourselves on adaptability and keeping up with the latest technologies. Our current tech stack looks like this', 'Angular,Typescript, PrimeNG, TailWind', 'Figma', '.NET C#', 'Azure DevOps CI/CD, Git', 'Kubernetes, Docker, Harbor', 'Why work with us?', "Relational FS is one of Greece's leading technology software companies, with a mission to provide our clients with innovative, scalable, and secure software solutions that enhance their business performance and customer satisfaction. Through matrix organizational structure we achieve cross-functional collaboration which helps to increase efficiency, innovation, and responsiveness to changing markets. Along with that we introduced a software coaching/mentoring scheme which provides guidance, feedback, and support to software engineers or learners who want to improve their skills, knowledge, and performance.", 'You will collaborate with experienced and talented people, who will inspire you, mentor you, and help you grow. You will also have access to numerous resources, tools, and facilities that will enable you to do your best work.', 'As an equal opportunity employer, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Our company is people - centric and offers personalized benefits to each employee:', 'We want you to be well compensated for what you bring in, so we offer an attractive salary package', 'Your health matters to us, so all colleagues have a private health insurance plan from day one', 'Developer’s fuel is coffee, and the supply source is in our kitchen!', 'We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting projects', 'We love the Relational vibes so we gather on smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together!', "Relational Financial Solutions adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published in https://www.relationalfs.com/legal-information/pri.... By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with Relational Financial Solutions you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorise Relational Financial Solutions to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line to the Policy."]

details: ['Τεχνικός Υποστήριξης Hardware & Software', 'Τεχνικός Υποστήριξης', 'Hardware', '&', 'Software', 'Η εταιρεία μας:', 'Η εταιρεία μας:', 'Η εταιρεία μας, ηγέτιδα στον χώρο της τεχνολογίας, προσφέρει ολοκληρωμένες λύσεις αυτοματισμού υψηλής τεχνολογίας και υλοποιεί σύνθετα έργα πληροφορικής και επικοινωνιών. Αναζητούμε έναν δυναμικό και καταρτισμένο Τεχνικό Υποστήριξης Hardware & Software για να ενταχθεί στην ομάδα μας.', 'Καθήκοντα:', 'Καθήκοντα:', 'Εγκατάσταση, συντήρηση και επισκευή ηλεκτρονικού εξοπλισμού (hardware) τόσο σε περιβάλλον γραφείου όσο και στο πεδίο.', 'Υποστήριξη πελατών και επίλυση τεχνικών προβλημάτων σε hardware και software.', 'Παρακολούθηση συστημάτων και εφαρμογών με χρήση εργαλείων παρακολούθησης για εξασφάλιση ομαλής λειτουργίας 24/7.', 'Ανάλυση σφαλμάτων και επίλυση προβλημάτων σε περιβάλλοντα Linux και Windows.', 'Επιτόπια τεχνική υποστήριξη και εκπαίδευση πελατών σε Ελλάδα και εξωτερικό.', 'Τήρηση διαδικασιών και καταγραφή προβλημάτων και λύσεων μέσω ticketing συστήματος.', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα:', 'Απαραίτητα Προσόντα:', 'Τεχνική κατάρτιση σε Ηλεκτρονική, Πληροφορική ή σχετικό πεδίο.', 'Εμπειρία στη διαχείριση και συντήρηση συστημάτων hardware και υποστήριξη εφαρμογών software.', 'Ικανότητες ανάλυσης σφαλμάτων και debugging σε συστήματα Linux και Windows.', 'Εμπειρία στην υποστήριξη πελατών και την επίλυση τεχνικών προβλημάτων.', 'Εξαιρετικές επικοινωνιακές δεξιότητες.', 'Δίπλωμα οδήγησης.', 'Γνώσεις ηλεκτρολογίας θα θεωρηθούν επιπλέον προσόν.', 'Τι Προσφέρουμε:', 'Τι Προσφέρουμε:', 'Σταθερή και πλήρη απασχόληση με κυλιόμενο ωράριο που περιλαμβάνει βάρδιες και ενδεχόμενη εργασία τα Σαββατοκύριακα.', 'Φιλικό και δυναμικό περιβάλλον εργασίας με δυνατότητες ανάπτυξης.', 'Ευκαιρίες επαγγελματικής εξέλιξης σε μια συνεχώς αναπτυσσόμενη εταιρεία.']

role: Software Validation Consultants in Life Science@Thessaloniki
details:
['What Impact will you make?', 'What Impact will you make?', 'Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?', 'opportunity', 'Thessaloniki', 'hybrid working model', 'Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?', 'large scale', 'projects for industry-leading clients', 'career', 'international level', 'If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!', 'opportunity', 'You bring passion, we bring opportunities!', '#YourOpportunity', '#YourOpportunity', 'Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Alexander Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.', 'Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina', 'Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.', 'both young and senior professionals', 'We are currently seeking young graduates to join our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory team in Thessaloniki!', 'Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory', 'Thessaloniki', 'Are you an ambitious team player with exceptional analytical skills and a well-rounded personality?', 'Are you a highly motivated graduate, who enjoys IT systems & Software Development Life Cycle and would flourish as part of a diverse team?', 'Are you interested in IT business risks and services designed to determine acceptable exposure levels, implement controls, and provide follow-up as well as a constant monitoring on Quality?', 'Apply now and seize the opportunity to jumpstart on your career and become part of our dynamic team in our offices in Thessaloniki.', '#YourServiceLine', '#YourServiceLine', 'Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory', 'Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory', "Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) is an end-to-end strategic advisory practice, enabling our C-suite clients to make informed, robust decisions and strategic choices. It integrates the full scale of Deloitte's M&A capabilities, consolidates Climate & Sustainability advisory capabilities, and tightens the connection between strategy development and risk management to assist clients with navigating uncertainty and change.", '#AboutYourTeam', '#AboutYourTeam', 'Quality & Compliance is a key department within Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory with an ambitious plan in terms of growth, innovation, talent management and market recognition. We help clients take advantage of the benefits of innovative new digital technology, support their digital transformation, regulatory compliance and control assurance, provide improved data driven leadership insights, and thus support growth and innovation.', '#AboutYourRole', '#AboutYourRole', 'As a Consultant in our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory department, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our clients in identifying, assessing, and managing risks that may impact their business objectives. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams and leveraging your expertise to deliver value-added insights.', 'Consultant', 'You will in be part of a team that is responsible to:', '• Provide guidance and support on computer system validation (CSV) and software assurance;', '• Support efforts to drive consistent interpretation of CSV and incorporate into the SDLC process;', '• Provide regulatory compliance guidance (e.g. FDA, Part 11).', '#OurRequirements', '#OurRequirements', 'Key Qualifications', 'Key Qualifications', 'The ideal candidate should have the following requirements:', '• You have a Master degree in Computer Science Engineering, Mathematical Engineering, Sciences, Bachelor in Informatics;', '• You see Technology as a business enabler and have an interest in the latest trends.', '• You are keen on daily interaction and close collaboration with the client.', '• You are analytical, proactive and know how to tackle a problem.', '• You adapt easily to changing circumstances as you enjoy new challenges every day.', '• You are a team player and you communicate smoothly;', '• You have a sound knowledge of English other languages are a plus e.g. French, and have an excellent knowledge of MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, …).', 'Bonus Qualifications', 'Bonus Qualifications', '• Experience in computer system validation (CSV) or life science industry is a plus;', "If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!", '#WhatWeOffer', '#WhatWeOffer', 'At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:', '🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working', '⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)', '🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.', '📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends', '🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust', '🤼 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work', '🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities', '🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding', '🌴 Extra days of annual leave', '⚕ Private medical health insurance plan', '💳 Ticket restaurant card', '🛒 Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others', '📱 Mobile phone', '🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices', 'Please note that all well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.', 'About Deloitte', 'About Deloitte', '#OurServices', '#OurServices', 'Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit, Technology & Transformation, Financial Advisory, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.', '#OurPurpose', '#OurPurpose', "We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.", '#OurValues', '#OurValues', 'At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.', '#OurTalentExperience', '#OurTalentExperience', 'From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.', 'Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.', 'Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.', 'Location: Thessaloniki', 'Location:', 'This document has been prepared by Deloitte Business Solutions Societe Anonyme of Business Consultants, Deloitte Certified Public Accountants Societe Anonyme and Deloitte Alexander Competence Center Single Member Societe Anonyme of Business Consultants.

details:
['Kariera.Group Recruitment Services is seeking an experienced Customer Service Supervisor to join a leading company in the food industry, known for its dedication to sustainability and quality. The company specializes in raw materials and serves artisans, retailers, industrial clients, in over 100 countries. This role offers the opportunity to lead a team and manage key logistics and customer service operations in a fast-paced environment.', 'Kariera.Group Recruitment Services', 'Customer Service Supervisor', 'Job Description: We are looking for a proactive and organized Customer Service Supervisor to join the team in Oinofyta. This position involves leading a team, managing orders (sales orders & stock transfers), and connecting these with other processes and communication with other departments.  This position also involves optimizing logistics, improving communication, and working with various departments to ensure smooth operations.', 'Job Description:', 'Location: Oinofyta (Hybrid: 2-3 remote working days per month)', 'Location', 'Key responsibilities:', 'Key responsibilities:', '•    Lead and supervise a team managing orders and intra-company stock transfers.
•    Oversee logistics processes related to product transfers, ensuring compliance with invoicing policies and procedures.
•    Utilize SAP to manage orders, invoicing, and related supply chain operations.
•    Collaborate with internal departments to streamline workflows, optimize communication, and implement organizational changes.
•    Monitor and analyze Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and implement corrective actions as needed.
•    Organize and lead customer service meetings to enhance delivery performance.
•    Drive digitization initiatives and identify cost-saving opportunities.
•    Manage customs and ensure compliance with food regulatory documentation for exports.', '•', 'Required qualifications:', 'Required qualifications:', '•    Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, or a related field 
•    5+ years of experience in customer service, order management, or logistics
•    Proficiency in SAP (mandatory) and MS Office 
•    Fluent in English (oral and written) with native proficiency in Greek
•    Solid knowledge of invoicing policies and processes related to product transfers
•    Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills
•    Proven ability to lead teams, collaborate across departments, and adapt to organizational changes', 'SAP', 'mandatory', 'English', 'Proven', 'The company offers:', 'The company offers:', '•    Competitive compensation package and annual performance bonus .
•    Private medical insurance and a private pension plan .
•    Company-provided transportation from Athens and Chalkida .
•    Laptop and mobile phone provided .
•    Opportunities for continuous training and professional growth .']

details: ['Η ΙΜΕ Πληροφορική από το 1977 εξειδικεύεται στην ανάπτυξη λογισμικού για την παροχή μηχανογραφικών λύσεων. Έχει έδρα την Πάτρα και υποκατάστημα στην Αθήνα. Κατά κύριο λόγο οι πελάτες μας είναι συγκοινωνιακοί οργανισμοί και καταστήματα εστίασης προσφέροντας ολοκληρωμένες λύσεις μηχανογράφησης. role: Junior Java Developer with QA & Documentation Skills
details:
["We're Hiring: Junior Java Developer with QA & Documentation Skills", "About Olympus Marine Group:
We specialize in energy-saving systems, custom software development, and real-time data transmission technologies. Our mission is to deliver high-performance tech solutions to the maritime and industrial sectors — and we're growing fast.", 'The Role:
We’re looking for a Junior Java Developer who’s not just comfortable with code, but also values quality and clear communication. You’ll work across multiple areas, including:
Java development on real-time systems and custom tools
Writing and maintaining technical documentation (APIs, system overviews, release notes, etc.)
Supporting the QA process, including manual and automated testing, and collaborating closely with our senior engineers and product leads', 'Ideal Candidate:
•    1–2 years of experience in Java (Spring Boot or similar frameworks a plus)
•    Comfortable writing technical documentation in English
•    Basic understanding of software testing principles
•    Bonus: familiar with tools like Git, Jira, Swagger, Postman, or JUnit
•    Strong attention to detail and a willingness to learn multiple aspects of the software lifecycle', 'Why Join Us?', 'Work in a specialized, high-tech marine environment
Gain experience across development, documentation, and QA
Small team, direct impact, and room to grow into more advanced roles
Hands-on with real-time systems used worldwide']

details: ['H IQ Solutions είναι μία εταιρεία πληροφορικής με πάνω από 20 χρόνια παρουσίας στον χώρο, έχοντας δημιουργήσει ένα μοναδικό χαρτοφυλάκιο προϊόντων και υπηρεσιών. details: ['About the Role:', 'About the Role:', "This role is ideal for a detail-oriented and analytical professional who enjoys balancing financial analysis with client communication. details: ['Job description', 'MainSys is a high-tech company that for the last 19 years develops, integrates and supports large-scale IT projects in Greece and abroad. role: Technical Support Consultant, SOFTONE Sunsoft (Entry Level)
details: ['The merger of SOFTONE and ENTERSOFT has formed the largest provider of business software products and services in Greece. This newly unified organization now boasts over 1,500 employees and an extensive network of 700+ specialized partners, effectively serving a growing customer base of 90,000+ businesses across four countries (Greece, Cyprus, Bulgaria, and Romania).', 'SOFTONE', 'ENTERSOFT', 'over 1,500 employees', '700+ specialized partners', '90,000+ businesses across four countries', 'With strong expertise, high specialization, and continuous investment in innovation, the new organization offers a comprehensive portfolio of digital solutions—ranging from ERP, CRM, HCM, and Accounting to Digital Commerce platforms, E-Invoicing services, solutions for freelancers and small businesses, ESG Reporting, E-Procurement, and industry-specific applications for retail, hospitality, and other sectors. These solutions provide high added value to businesses, actively supporting their digital transformation across all processes.', 'comprehensive portfolio of digital solutions', 'ERP, CRM, HCM, and Accounting', 'Digital Commerce platforms, E-Invoicing services, solutions for freelancers and small businesses, ESG Reporting, E-Procurement, and industry-specific applications for retail, hospitality, and other sectors', 'high added value', 'digital transformation', 'For more information, visit:\n🌐 www.softone.gr\n🌐 www.entersoft.gr', 'SOFTONE Sunsoft is looking for a Technical Support Consultant to join our high caliber team.', 'Technical Support Consultant', 'Your contribution to the success of the team', 'Your contribution to the success of the team', 'Installation and technical support on client premises', 'Support via Remote Desktop', 'Telephone customer support', 'Your Qualifications & Competencies', 'Your Qualifications & Competencies', 'Degree in Computer Science or relevant field', 'Good knowledge of operating systems, Office software package, and LAN-WAN network services', 'Ability to diagnose and troubleshoot equipment malfunctions (servers/PCs)', "Driver's license", 'Responsibility and reliability', 'Communication skills', 'Proficiency in English', 'Nice to have:', 'Nice to have:', 'Knowledge of Windows Server, SQL Server', '2 years of experience in catering establishments', 'Software installation and Wi-Fi network setup', 'PC hardware assembly', 'Your Benefits:', 'Your Benefits:', 'We are growing our team with the vision of having top performers who contribute directly to the growth of the company. As a result, we offer:', '💰Competitive remuneration package', '❤️Private health insurance plan', '💯Opportunity to work alongside people who are always eager to mentor', '🚍Transportation with company’s bus from central stations', '📖 Funded training & development opportunities', '🥪Catering food services']

details: ['Η ΙΜΕ Πληροφορική από το 1977 εξειδικεύεται στην ανάπτυξη λογισμικού για την παροχή μηχανογραφικών λύσεων. Έχει έδρα την Πάτρα και υποκατάστημα στην Αθήνα. Απασχολεί περισσότερα από 35 άτομα και διαθέτει συνεργάτες σε όλη την Ελλάδα. Κατά κύριο λόγο οι πελάτες μας είναι συγκοινωνιακοί οργανισμοί και καταστήματα εστίασης προσφέροντας ολοκληρωμένες λύσεις μηχανογράφησης. Αναζητούμε άτομα για την στελέχωση του τμήματος υποστήριξης εφαρμογών στην Πατρα. Ο/Η υποψήφιος/α θα εκπαιδευτεί σταδιακά ώστε να αναλάβει θέση στην υποστήριξη μηχανογραφικών εφαρμογών και χρηστών.', 'Απαραίτητες προϋποθέσεις:', 'Απαραίτητες προϋποθέσεις:', 'Πτυχίο πληροφορικής ΑΕΙ /ΤΕΙ / ΙΕΚ', 'Γνώση MS OFFICE, WORD, EXCEL', 'Δυνατότητες επικοινωνίας σε γραπτό και προφορικό λόγο', 'Άριστες ικανότητες οργάνωσης και συνεργασίας', 'Δίπλωμα Οδήγησης Ι.Χ.', 'Τι Προσφέρουμε:', 'Τι Προσφέρουμε:', 'Ανταγωνιστικό πακέτο αποδοχών', 'Θέση εργασίας πλήρους απασχόλησης', 'Συνεχή εκπαίδευση.', 'Υποστήριξη και επίβλεψη από έμπειρα στελέχη', 'Είδος Εργασίας: Πλήρης απασχόληση, Μόνιμος']
tags: ['erp', 'software', 'customer support', 'υποστήριξη εφαρμογών', 'εξυπηρετηση πελατων', 'μηχανογραφηση', 'πληροφορικη']
